title: Merchant Directory
noStoresFound: No store records found in system
selectCitiesFirst: Select cities first to see available towns
manageDeliveryPricing: Manage your delivery zones and pricing
addAreaNote: Note: Adding a city will automatically include all its towns/neighborhoods with the default price you set. You can then customize individual prices below.
noAreasFoundForTown: No delivery areas found for this town.
resetDeliveryAreasMessage: Are you sure you want to remove all delivery areas? This action cannot be undone.
noSocialMedia: No social media links added. Select a platform to add one.
acceptOffDay: Accept orders even on off days
acceptClosedHours: Accept orders even during closed hours
notAcceptingOrdersMsg: Your store is currently set to not accept any orders. Customers will successfully browse your menu but cannot add items to cart or place orders.
selectTypeFirst: Please select a business type first to see categories
enableStoreReviewsDesc: Allow customers to leave overall reviews and ratings for your store.
enableProductReviewsDesc: Allow customers to leave specific reviews and ratings for individual products.
